thread.title: Cloud services bolster Microsoft results shares soar
thread.title_full: Cloud services bolster Microsoft results shares soar

title: Cloud services bolster Microsoft results shares soar
text:
Cloud services bolster Microsoft results, shares soar 
Reuters Business News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
MSFT.O ) reported better-than-expected quarterly adjusted revenue for the ninth quarter in a row, boosted by burgeoning demand for its cloud products, sending its shares soaring in after-hours trading on Thursday....
